sentences.sentence: Upon my word, you give your opinion very decidedly for so young a person.
sentences.translation: 真想不到，你这么年轻，倒挺有主见啊！

sentences.sentence: I'm a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
sentences.translation: 我很相信运气，事实上我发现越努力，我的运气越好。

sentences.sentence: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
sentences.translation: 人生宛如一场牌局，拿到什么牌，那是命中注定，但如何出牌，却操之在己。

sentences.sentence: You can do whatever you put your mind to.
sentences.translation: 你可以做任何你想做的事。

sentences.sentence: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing. -Mother Teresa
sentences.translation: 每次你对某人微笑，都是一种爱的行为，是送给那个人的礼物，是一件美丽的事。—— 特蕾莎修女
